UniprotID	Q9UKA9-5
Accession	Q9UKA9;Q8N0Z1;Q8N160;Q8NFB0;Q8NFB1;Q969N9;Q96Q76
EntryName	PTBP2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Polypyrimidine tract-binding protein 2 (Neural polypyrimidine tract-binding protein) (Neurally-enriched homolog of PTB) (PTB-like protein)
GeneName	PTBP2 NPTB PTB PTBLP
Length	356
Function	RNA-binding protein which binds to intronic polypyrimidine tracts and mediates negative regulation of exons splicing. May antagonize in a tissue-specific manner the ability of NOVA1 to activate exon selection. In addition to its function in pre-mRNA splicing, plays also a role in the regulation of translation.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility
